content: this twisting hat is knit in the round using circular or double pointed needles the construction is simple and easy to knit it is very strechy and its texture make it warm for long winters you re gonna love to wear it you will find two versions of the pattern one with fold over brim and one with simple brim **sizes** baby child teen adult adult large adult extra large finished size is about * 42 5 47 52 56 5 61 66 cm / 16 7 18 5 20 5 22 3 24 26 inches in circumference * 14 5 16 18 19 20 5 21 cm / 5 7 6 3 7 1 7 5 8 1 8 3 inches in length **yarn & yardage** you can use any bulky weight wool yarn of your liking * 80 90 100 110 120 130 meters / 88 99 109 121 132 143 yards * optional 20-40 for a pompom depending on the size you want it to be **needles** for ribs 5 5mm / us 7 circulars with 40cm 16 cable for body 6mm / us 8 circulars with 40cm 16 cable **gauge** 18 stitches / 20 row = 10x10cm / 4x4 inches in stockinette stitch on larger needles **notions** knitting in the round right twist have fun
